messages.content: give me a hardware list for a 5000 pound computer

Here is a hardware list for a 5000 pound computer:
- 5000 pound computer tower
- 24" monitor
- Keyboard and mouse
- Network switch
- 1000 watt power supply
- 16 GB RAM
- 256 GB solid state drive
- Intel i7 processor
- Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 graphics card
- 2x 1 TB hard drives
- 1200 watt power supply
give me the actual hardware name
Intel i7 processor, Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 graphics card, 1200 watt power supply.
